amendment.description: Expressing the sense of Congress on media coverage of the return to the United States of the remains of deceased members of the Armed Forces from overseas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3458 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 38. Record Vote Number: 131.

action.text: Amendment SA 3458 proposed by Senator Warner.
Amendment SA 3458 was modified to reflect a first degree status by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3458 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 3291. (consideration: CR S7035-7037; text: CR S7036) Expressing the sense of Congress on media coverage of the return to the United States of the remains of deceased members of the Armed Forces from overseas.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3458 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 38. Record Vote Number: 131.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3458 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 38. Record Vote Number: 131.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3458 proposed by Senator Warner.
